page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: John Fyffe Ltd is one of a Scottish group of companies.It is sited near Dalbeattie Granite Quarry for easy access to granite chips.They make reconstructed stone building blocks and paving stones using granite chips,cement,iron oxide pigments for colour and water. The mixture is hydraulicly pressed and cured for two weeks before cutting to size. There are 5 sizes and 11 colours of blocks and 3 sizes and 6 colours of paving flags.These are distributed to mainly builders merchants as far north as central Scotland and the north of England. The plant employs 15 people mainly in production with 2 office staff a foreman and a mechanic driver.
